body.name: STAYGOLD 2024 Signal Enhance TV Antenna Indoor with 600+ Miles Range Supports 1080p 4K for Smart HDTV and Older TVs, 18ft HDTV Cable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 42 mins
features: Are you tired of paying hefty cable bills? Say goodbye to expensive subscriptions and embrace the freedom of StayGold TV Antenna! Our 2024 Upgraded TV Antenna is here to revolutionize your television viewing with its exceptional features and superior performance.

Unparalleled Signal Reception: With an impressive range of 600+ miles, our digital antenna ensures crystal-clear reception of your favorite local channels such as ABC, CBS, NBC, FOX, and many more. Whether you're into news, sitcoms, kids' shows, or sports programs, our antenna supports 720p, 1080i, 1080p, 2K, and even 4K HDR, bringing you an immersive visual experience.

Versatile Indoor/Outdoor Installation: Setting up our antenna is a breeze! Choose from a variety of installation methods including wall mounting, adhesive sticks, or nylon cable ties. You can place it on a table, hang it on a wall, or even use it indoors or outdoors. For optimal signal strength, we recommend positioning it near a window or in a high location.

Thick Coaxial Cable: We understand the importance of a stable signal, which is why our digital HD antenna comes with a 18ft high-performance coaxial cable. Made of top-quality copper wire, this thick cable ensures reliable and interference-free signal reception. Compatible with all digital-ready devices, including 1080p and 4K smart televisions.

Warranty and Support: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We offer a 90-day refund policy and a lifetime warranty for our antenna. Should you encounter any issues, our dedicated customer service team is available 24/7 to provide prompt assistance.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.2 3.2 out of 5 stars 65 ratings 3.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but works great!
reviews.reviewText: I connected the antenna and scanned, but got much less channels that my other TVs. Was ready to box it up and return until I realized I forgot to plug in the USB. Rescanned and had everything came in clearly. It is adorably small and works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Outperformed by older flat panel antennas - look elsewhere.
reviews.reviewText: Thought I would replace a 3 year old cheap flat panel antenna pulled in 46 channels - but did not consistently pull in core channels to watch play offs. So I bought this with its 600 mile range hype to bring in a local CBS and ABC channel. It didn't even find the channels on the initial scan - it only found 33 of the previous 46 channels. Moving the antenna around didn't help. Additionally, the package was generic - no brand listed, unsealed box, with cheap graphics. So you might say the packaging matched the performance. The antenna itself was smaller than expected compared to the graphics in the add, and appeared to be made of low quality plastic. 600 mile "range" might be square mile coverage - which works out to @ a 20-25 mile range at most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It just works
reviews.reviewText: I have had a USB TV tuner for years. The one I have now came with a simple 9" single pole antenna. It works, kinda. All of the Kansas City T transmitters are basically south of me about 20 miles. Unfortunately, my apartment's only outside walls face east and west. The itty-bitty antenna works for a couple of stations, but not that well. So I decided to upgrade, and this one seemed to be the best value. I just got it today, and it works for the most part. A few of the stations still lag and pixelate. I think if I move the antenna outside so there are no other apartments between me and the transmitters I should be fine. I will update tomorrow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 600 mile range NO
reviews.reviewText: would not recommend if you live away from a major city.I'm 60 miles from cleveland and didn't pick up one station from there.i will say we did get 18 channels and they did come in very clear.if you live in the country - NOif you live in the big city - i would say you have a chance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little thing
reviews.reviewText: I cut the cord over a year ago and just watch streaming services. I was missing out on the football games that were on CBS and FOX. Now with this beauty I was able to scan 92 digital channels in my area and now I can watch football

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I get less local channels
reviews.reviewText: I hooked up very easy to do which happy about. I actually got less channels than I did from my other 1 that is just a small 1 that hangs on the wall. I placed it in numerous places and could still only get 11 channels, Tampa and Orlando or only 50 miles from me, and I can't pick any of them up, my old antenna at least picked up abc and fox. Big disappointment mainly bought it to pick up CBS,NBC, and Fox to watch football. I'm not even going to get to watch the Superbowl tomorrow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wish I had purchased a long time ago
reviews.reviewText: This is a the a works like a charm. I get 25 channels in either English and Spanish. Fantastic! Easy to set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars THIS ANTENNA IS USELESS
reviews.reviewText: WHEN I RECEIVED THIS UNIT, I IMMEDIATELY INSTALLED IT. SPENT 4 HOURS PLUS TRYING TO GET IT TO RECOGNIZE THE 4 LOCAL BROADCAST STATIONS THAT ARE LESS THAN 50 MILES AWAY_ALL IN THE SAME DIRECTION. I TRIED EVERYTHING THEY SAID TO DO. IT IS USELESS. AND NOW, AMAZON IS CHARGING ME TO RETURN THIS PIECE OF CRAP THEY SOLD ME. PRIME USED TO BE WORTH IT. NOW, THEIR GREED IS SHOWING. I QUESS BEZOS DOESN'T BELIEVE HE IS RICH ENOUGH!!
